mapper.sql: ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, CODING, CREATION_DATE, CREATOR, MODIFIER, MODIFIED_DATE, GROUP_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
from ecm_group where PARENT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by NAME
mapper.insert:
insert into ecm_group
ID,
NAME,

update ecm_group
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODING = #{coding,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIED_DATE = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GROUP_TYPE = #{groupType,jdbcType=CHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ecm_group set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODING = #{coding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIED_DATE = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GROUP_TYPE = #{groupType,jdbcType=CHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
